name: claude-restarter
description: Restart Claude app automatically when config file is saved

commands.title: Find Claude Config File
commands.description: Automatically search for the Claude config file

claudeRestarter.configFilePath.description: The path to the Claude config file to watch (on Windows, uses %APPDATA%\Claude)

claudeRestarter.restartDelay.description: Delay in seconds between quitting and restarting Claude

claudeRestarter.autoRestartOnSave.description: Automatically restart Claude Desktop when the config file is saved (no prompt)

claudeRestarter.showDesktopNotifications.description: Show notifications when Claude is restarted or errors occur

claudeRestarter.performHealthCheck.description: Check if Claude is running after restart attempt

claudeRestarter.findClaudeConfigAutomati.description: Automatically search for Claude config file and prompt to browse if not found

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:env-expansion
scripts.package-rename: npx @vscode/vsce package && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); try { fs.renameSync('claude-restarter-' + pkg.version + '.vsix', 'claude-restarter.vsix'); console.log('Renamed VSIX file successfully'); } catch(e) { console.error('Error renaming file:', e.message); }"
